show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content: Today we look at the ongoing implications of drone warfare; at the bottom of the hour we will hear from Steve Zeltzer... <!--more--> of Work Week Radio; and we round out todayâ€™s show with the latest developments in the Occupy Movement as we hear about the Occupy Caravan to Philadelphia for summer 2012.
